sentences.sContent: Like the legend of the snake-shaped genie who protects the gold from prospectors and holy men trying to exorcise it with tricks and prayers.
sentences.sContent_eng: Like the legend of the snake-shaped genie who protects the gold from prospectors and holy men trying to exorcise it with tricks and prayers.
sentences.sCn: 这里的晚上充满着噪声和故事。 传说中蛇妖保护黄金，淘金者和虔诚的人试图用巫术和祷告来驱除妖魔。

words.tran: 驱魔；驱邪；用魔法召鬼魂
